name: SPECTMPI
title: SPECT MPI
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains CPT codes associated with SPECT MPI.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this data element is to identify patients with SPECT MPI.),(Inclusion Criteria: CPT codes associated with SPECT MPI are included in this value set.),(Exclusion Criteria: Codes not associated with SPECT MPI are excluded from this value set. Codes captured in systems other than CPT are also excluded from the value set.)

concept.display: Myocardial perfusion imaging, tomographic (SPECT) (including attenuation correction, qualitative or quantitative wall motion, ejection fraction by first pass or gated technique, additional quantification, when performed); single study, at rest or stress (exercise or pharmacologic)

Myocardial perfusion imaging, tomographic (SPECT) (including attenuation correction, qualitative or quantitative wall motion, ejection fraction by first pass or gated technique, additional quantification, when performed); multiple studies, at rest and/or stress (exercise or pharmacologic) and/or redistribution and/or rest reinjection
